    • createScienceJournal

      @RequestMapping(value="/sciencejournals/", method=POST) public Book createScienceJournal​(@RequestBody ScienceJournal scienceJournal)
      CREATE : a client can use a REST call to put an ScienceJournal into the system providing its name, author, barcode, quantity and unit price

    • updateScienceIndex

      @RequestMapping(value="/updatescienceindex/{barcode}/{newscienceindex}/", method=PUT) public ScienceJournal updateScienceIndex​(@PathVariable("barcode") int barcode, @PathVariable("newscienceindex") int newscienceindex)
      UPDATE Name A client can use this REST call to update science index providing the barcode of the science journal to be modified
